sentence: A technology revolution is taking place, with artificial intelligence chips playing a central role.
AI chips, which make AI systems such as ChatGPT faster and cheaper, can solve difficult problems traditional computers can’t.
The technology isn’t cheap, with the H100 GPU listing for $30,000.
Nvidia, led by Jensen Huang, and the leading designer of AI chips, recently soared 25% and briefly hit $1 trillion.
The rise of these artificial intelligence chips is having huge economic effects on the technology sector.
